pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ordered Lasso and Time-Lag Sparse Regression // Ordered lasso and time-lag sparse regression. Ordered Lasso fits a linear model and imposes an order constraint on the coefficients. It writes the coefficients as positive and negative parts, and requires positive parts and negative parts are non-increasing and positive. Time-Lag Lasso generalizes the ordered Lasso to a general data matrix with multiple predictors. For more details, see Suo, X.,Tibshirani, R., (2014) 'An Ordered Lasso and Sparse Time-lagged Regression'.
